title: Game Clarification: Possible Addition
body:
I was wondering if it would be possible to add:
- The explosion radius of Tristana's bomb {{champion:18}}  (like for Zilean {{champion:26}} )
- Adding a "ping" (ms) gauge in the client  to prevent people from joining a game when they have high ping.

Cheers
Gekko

replies.body: Also a radius on rubmles q too, i always seem to be in even though the flames dont hit me
